programmes.show_description: Enter Stanman: Stan becomes worried about the content of Francine's dreams - so Roger teaches him how to enter them, but things quickly go awry.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part Three: Reality show. The reunion concludes with a heated face-off as the group discuss discrepancies surrounding the final dinner in Amsterdam.

Heart of Evil: Animated fun with Scooby-Doo and the gang. The gang work with the Blue Falcon and Dynomutt to stop a dragon robot that the Blue Falcon has wanted to catch for years.

American Goth: Animated adventure series. Shaggy discovers that his friend Amelia has become a Goth and decides to become one too, but an evil plant monster has other ideas...
Omelettes Are Forever: Animated adventure series. The gang get caught up in international espionage and intrigue when they cross paths with a British secret agent on a mission.

Reality series. While some of the Essex crew go on a camping trip, Junaid goes for brunch with Dani and admits he's falling for Joe, but is worried Joe doesn't feel the same.

Reality show hosted by Olivia Attwood. There is chaos in the kitchen that leaves Jean-Christophe with no choice but to shut the restaurant, and a tense debrief shatters the team.
Cat Fight: Fur flies when Quagmire decides to open a cat cafe. Brian does all he can to get the cafe closed down. Meanwhile, Lois decides to enrol Meg and Chris in church camp.

Adam West High: Brian's campaign to rename the school after Adam West is successful, and he feels compelled to run for mayor. However, he faces competition from Quagmire.
Who Smarted?: Worried that he's not smart enough for Hayley, Jeff undergoes an experimental intelligence enhancement procedure at the CIA.
No Weddings and a Funeral: Fed up of the family not respecting him, Klaus leaves. Fifteen years later the Smiths reunite to attend Klaus' funeral - but nothing is as it seems.
Show Mama from the Grave: Animated comedy. When the Belchers head to a lake for some watersports, Bob's choice to make a side trip to see his mother's grave leads to some problems.
